sections.heading: Judicial partitionPartition must be judicial when:(1) A party is an unrepresented absentee, minor, or mental incompetent; or(2) All the interested parties cannot agree upon a nonjudicial partition
sections.text: Judicial partitionPartition must be judicial when:(1) A party is an unrepresented absentee, minor, or mental incompetent; or(2) All the interested parties cannot agree upon a nonjudicial partition.
